word: To those who are inclined to suspect others of wrongdoing and to charge their brethren with evil, I would say, "Please read in the book Great Controversy the chapter entitled 'The Origin of Evil.'" Bring home its truths to your individual hearts. Remember that it was the spirit of envy and evil surmising, cherished in the heart of the rebel angel, that began the evil work that opened the floodgates of woe upon our world.
